categories: Category:Classic Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back

nodes.text: Classic Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back (TPB)
Classic Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back was a reprint trade paperback collection, collecting both issues of the Classic Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back series.

The best Star Wars comics creative team ever to put pen to paper, Archie Goodwin and Al Williamson, unite once again to adapt the second Star Wars movie to comic-book form. Join Luke as his Jedi training with Yoda continues and as the Rebels' fight against the Empire takes a turn for the worse.
